price: као потомство, једне од других. Аллах све чује и све зна.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَۢ بَعۡضُهَا مِنۢ بَعۡضٖۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
